author: Maelstrom_ninja
title: fun but expensive
review:
Minifigures: Kai in his dragon suit looks pretty cool, it would be nice if the set came with his cards, Nuckal has a large head with yellow spikes, I don't know what I think of that, however his ax looks fairly dangerous.

Price: This set has some big peices, but not enough to make it worth the $25 most f the pieces are small. However the spinner, Nuckal's head, the wheels and the cannon might be most of that price.

Set: The vehicle itself is very cool, with a spring loaded cannon and very good suspension, it has an exhaust pipe on one side only, making it look a little lopsided. all in all this is a very good but pricey set.

author: Andy317
title: Poor Value and Set in General
review: This set is easily the worst of the first wave. Again, it includes kai, who they throw into every small set (the blacksmith shop and ninja ambush sets are better) and also the price to part on this feels way off, considering there aren’t even any huge standout pieces. The skeleton Minifigure is alright, but the build is the worst part. It’s a skeletal car with the only function being that it can roll around. Wow, so innovative! I wouldn’t buy this for more than $10 on eBay, SEALED.

author: Master_Wu
title: A Little Tricky, a Lot of Fun
review:
This Set was a bit tricky to build, but a lot of fun!

Ninjago is a great TV show and this is another great set from the show! 

This set includes two minifigures: Nickel, and Kai (DX). Kai's leg and torso printings look amazing and shiny, and Nuckel's look good too.

The ATV has less parts than you'd think, but it all adds up well. It has some suspension, a place for a minifigure to stand, and a missile launcher in front! It even includes a spinner for Kai!

I have had a lot of fun with this set and I highly recommend it!

 

NINJAAGOOOOOOO!!!
